Text: I hope everyone is happy with the finished product! It took a lot of time and effort, but in the end I wanted to 'spread the wealth' and share with those that can't afford to buy this very expensive book. I hope you all enjoy it! ;^)
I say you did a pretty good job! Thanks for your efforts!
Thanks for the comment! It was my pleasure!
Your sir are a Hero of the Emperor!

While the quality of this is awesome, I'm sorry to report that page 79 appears to be missing.

Thanks!
